name: Tic Tac Toe (itch) (Zee)
description:
This was a simple two day project I created originally to test out my Tweening library but it got a little out of hand. 

The tweening library is still a work in progress and can be found here: EnvTween - Github

It is also recommended to use these easing functions if you do not want to write your own: EaseFunctions - Github

The Simple AI just pics random places to play.

The Complex AI (Hard) "should" be impossible to beat.

Credits:

Developer / Designer - Evgeny "Zee" Vasilyev - Website

3D Art - Austin Crane - Artstation - Website

Font - a Acakadut - Dafont.com
